entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
